title: Vieira's influence on enslaved people's resistance

content.question: Ideas such as those expressed by Vieira in his sermon would have the most significant influence on which of the following?

choices.label: Enlightenment challenges to imperial governments in the Americas
Enslaved persons’ resistance to authorities in the Americas
Growing resistance by plantation owners to European mercantilist practices
Challenges to traditional gender hierarchies in the Americas

content.answer: Enslaved persons’ resistance to authorities in the Americas

topic.text: 4.6: Internal and External Challenges to State Power from 1450 to 1750

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
